Welcome to Sniffaris!



A dog walking and pet drop in service offering caring and enriching pet care, based in Cookridge, covering Cookridge, Tinshill and the surrounding areas.

For any enquiries, please message me at jessie@sniffaris.co.uk

Insured and DBS checked
